name: 黃瀅瑛
objective:
本課程之目的在於教導學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究，等課程之基礎。

Introductory course to linear algebra and its applications.
schedule:
W01-03: Introduction to linear equations
W04-06: Linear transformations
W07-08: Linear space, subspace, dimensions
W09: Midterm exam
W10-11: Vector space, orthogonality, projection and least squares
W12-13: Determinants
W14-15: Eigenvalues & eigenvectors
W16: Diagonalization
W17: Difference equations & differential equations
W18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Homework, in-class performance & quiz: 30%
Midterm: 35%
Final exam: 35%
materials:
Gilbert Strang, Linear Algebra and Its Applications, Brooks/Cole, 4th ed. (2006)
ISBN: 0-03-010567-6
